languages.text: "Паства наша тронобоязненна и исправно записывает вокс-покаяния в святилище исповедей — ему отведено место в восточной части реликвария. Так мы неустанно следим, не возникают ли еретические поползновения, с усердием ли выполняются обязанности прихожан, не зреет ли опасное инакомыслие в их умах. Сортировкой исповедей занимается послушник Клотус — он покорно предоставит вам доступ к когитатору исповедальни".

traits.locale_text: "Паства наша тронобоязненна и исправно записывает вокс-покаяния в святилище исповедей — ему отведено место в восточной части реликвария. Так мы неустанно следим, не возникают ли еретические поползновения, с усердием ли выполняются обязанности прихожан, не зреет ли опасное инакомыслие в их умах. Сортировкой исповедей занимается послушник Клотус — он покорно предоставит вам доступ к когитатору исповедальни".

languages.text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."
languages.original_text: "Паства наша тронобоязненна и исправно записывает вокс-покаяния в святилище исповедей — ему отведено место в восточной части реликвария. Так мы неустанно следим, не возникают ли еретические поползновения, с усердием ли выполняются обязанности прихожан, не зреет ли опасное инакомыслие в их умах. Сортировкой исповедей занимается послушник Клотус — он покорно предоставит вам доступ к когитатору исповедальни".

This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."

"Ours is a Throne-fearing congregation that regularly sends vox-messages to the confession machine, which is housed in the western part of the reliquary. That allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies, the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, and any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds."

languages.text: « Notre pieuse congrégation laisse régulièrement des enregistrements vox au confessionnal du sanctuaire, qui est installé dans l'aile est du reliquaire. Ceci nous permet de surveiller en permanence les éventuelles tendances hérétiques, la diligence avec laquelle nos paroissiens accomplissent leur devoir et tout dissentiment néfaste qu'ils pourraient nourrir. C'est l'initié Klotus qui se charge de trier les confessions, et il se fera un honneur de vous donner accès au cogitateur chargé de les recueillir. »
languages.original_text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."

traits.locale_text: « Notre pieuse congrégation laisse régulièrement des enregistrements vox au confessionnal du sanctuaire, qui est installé dans l'aile est du reliquaire. Ceci nous permet de surveiller en permanence les éventuelles tendances hérétiques, la diligence avec laquelle nos paroissiens accomplissent leur devoir et tout dissentiment néfaste qu'ils pourraient nourrir. C'est l'initié Klotus qui se charge de trier les confessions, et il se fera un honneur de vous donner accès au cogitateur chargé de les recueillir. »

languages.text: «El nuestro es un rebaño temeroso del Trono y graba vocomensajes con frecuencia en el altar de confesión que hay en la zona este del relicario. Eso nos permite velar constantemente ante posibles tendencias heréticas. Podemos observar la diligencia con que nuestros feligreses cumplen con su deber y detectar cualquier indicio de disidencia. El iniciado Klotus está a cargo de ordenar las confesiones. Será un honor para él permitir que usted acceda al cogitador confesor».
languages.original_text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."

traits.locale_text: «El nuestro es un rebaño temeroso del Trono y graba vocomensajes con frecuencia en el altar de confesión que hay en la zona este del relicario. Eso nos permite velar constantemente ante posibles tendencias heréticas. Podemos observar la diligencia con que nuestros feligreses cumplen con su deber y detectar cualquier indicio de disidencia. El iniciado Klotus está a cargo de ordenar las confesiones. Será un honor para él permitir que usted acceda al cogitador confesor».

languages.text: “我们的信徒对黄金王座充满敬畏，他们会定期在告解机处进行告解。告解机位于圣骨匣东侧。有了他们的告解，我们便可以时刻留意一切可疑的异端倾向，了解教区居民履行职责时是否认真，弄清他们有没有在酝酿什么危险的计划。克罗图斯助祭负责整理告解词，如果您打算查看告解机的沉思者，他一定会感到万分荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."

traits.locale_text: “我们的信徒对黄金王座充满敬畏，他们会定期在告解机处进行告解。告解机位于圣骨匣东侧。有了他们的告解，我们便可以时刻留意一切可疑的异端倾向，了解教区居民履行职责时是否认真，弄清他们有没有在酝酿什么危险的计划。克罗图斯助祭负责整理告解词，如果您打算查看告解机的沉思者，他一定会感到万分荣幸。”

languages.text: 「私たちの信徒は王座に忠実な信徒であり、聖遺物庫の東側にある聖堂の告解室にヴォクス記録を定期的に残しています。そのおかげで、異端的な傾向がないか、こまめに監視できるのです。教区民が真剣に職務に取り組んでいるか、また彼らの心の中に危険な反発が生まれていないかも観察することができます。イニシエイト・クロットは、告解の選別を担当しています。彼は喜んで陛下に告解の考算機へアクセスさせることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの信徒は王座に忠実な信徒であり、聖遺物庫の東側にある聖堂の告解室にヴォクス記録を定期的に残しています。そのおかげで、異端的な傾向がないか、こまめに監視できるのです。教区民が真剣に職務に取り組んでいるか、また彼らの心の中に危険な反発が生まれていないかも観察することができます。イニシエイト・クロットは、告解の選別を担当しています。彼は喜んで陛下に告解の考算機へアクセスさせることでしょう」

languages.text: "Unsere Gemeinde ist thronfürchtig und schickt regelmäßig Vox-Nachrichten zum Beichtschrein im östlichen des Reliquiars. So können wir ständig nach ketzerischen Tendenzen Ausschau halten. Wir können überprüfen, wie aufrichtig unsere Gläubigen ihre Pflichten erfüllen, und können sichergehen, dass kein gefährlicher Dissens in ihrem Verstand heranwächst. Der Eingeweihte Klotus hat die Aufgabe, die Beichten zu sortieren. Es wäre ihm eine Ehre, Euch Zugang zum Beicht-Cogitator zu gewähren."
languages.original_text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."

Der Eingeweihte Klotus hat die Aufgabe, die Beichten zu sortieren. Es wäre ihm eine Ehre, Euch Zugang zum Beicht-Cogitator zu gewähren."

languages.text: "Bizimki, kutsal emanet odasının doğu bölümüne konuşlandırılmış günah çıkarma birimi mabedine düzenli olarak voks kayıtları bırakan, içinde Taht korkusu bulunan bir cemaattir. Bu sayede kâfirce eğilimleri sürekli olarak kontrol altında tutabiliriz. Cemaatimizden kimlerin vazifelerini icra ettiğini, hangilerinin zihinlerinde tehlikeli isyan düşünceleri yeşerdiğini isabetli bir şekilde gözlemleyebiliriz. Bu itirafları düzenlemekten sorumlu olan kişi Zangoç Klotus. Günah çıkarma kavramsayarı için size erişim sunmaktan onur duyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Ours is a Throne-fearing flock that regularly leaves vox-recordings in the shrine confessional housed in the eastern part of the reliquary. This allows us to maintain constant watch for any heretical tendencies. We can observe the earnesty with which our parishioners render their duties, as well as any dangerous dissent brewing in their minds. Initiate Klotus is responsible for sorting the confessions — he would be honoured to offer you access to the confessional cogitator."
